00020 int clGeometry::SetNumberID(const int number)
00021 {
00022   numberID = number;
00023 
00024   return (numberID);

00027 void clGeometry::CalculateExtremes(void)
00028 {
00029   try
00030   {
00031     double xDummy;
00032     double yDummy;
00033     double zDummy;
00034 
00035     if(GetNumberSurfaces() < 1)
00036     {
00037       throw clExceptionTree("clGeometry", "CalculateExtremes", "Geometry does not contain any surfaces.");
00038     }
00039 
00040     xMin = surfaceList[0]->GetMinX();
00041     xMax = surfaceList[0]->GetMaxX();
00042     yMin = surfaceList[0]->GetMinY();
00043     yMax = surfaceList[0]->GetMaxY();
00044     zMin = surfaceList[0]->GetMinZ();
00045     zMax = surfaceList[0]->GetMaxZ();
00046     for(int s=1; s<GetNumberSurfaces(); s++)
00047     {
00048       xDummy = surfaceList[s]->GetMinX();    xMin = (xMin < xDummy) ? xMin : xDummy;
00049       xDummy = surfaceList[s]->GetMaxX();    xMax = (xMax > xDummy) ? xMax : xDummy;
00050       yDummy = surfaceList[s]->GetMinY();    yMin = (yMin < yDummy) ? yMin : yDummy;
00051       yDummy = surfaceList[s]->GetMaxY();    yMax = (yMax > yDummy) ? yMax : yDummy;
00052       zDummy = surfaceList[s]->GetMinZ();    zMin = (zMin < zDummy) ? zMin : zDummy;
00053       zDummy = surfaceList[s]->GetMaxZ();    zMax = (zMax > zDummy) ? zMax : zDummy;
00054     }
00055   }
00056 
00057   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00058   {
00059     EX.AddMethodToTree("clGeometry::CalculateExtremes");
00060     throw(EX);
00061   }
00062 }
00063 
00064 void clGeometry::Initialise(void)
00065 {
00066   try
00067   {
00068     if(!initialised)
00069     {
00070       CalculateExtremes();
00071 
00072       initialised = 1;
00073     }
00074   }
00075 
00076   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00077   {
00078     EX.AddMethodToTree("clGeometry::Initialise");
00079     throw(EX);
00080   }
00081 }

00124 int clGeometry::GetNumberSurfaces(void) const
00125 {
00126   return (surfaceList.GetNumberItems());
00127 }
00128 
00129 int clGeometry::GetSurfaceEntry(const int ID) const
00130 {
00131   int entryNumber=-1;
00132 
00133   for(int i=0; i<GetNumberSurfaces() && entryNumber==-1; i++)
00134   {
00135     if(surfaceList[i]->GetNumberID() == ID)
00136     {
00137       entryNumber=i;
00138     }
00139   }
00140 
00141   return (entryNumber);
00142 }
00143 
00144 int clGeometry::AddSurface(const clSurface &newSurface)
00145 {
00146   // Add the new surface
00147   int entryNumber = surfaceList.AddItem(newSurface);
00148 
00149   // Reset the initialisation-flag
00150   initialised = 0;
00151 
00152   return(entryNumber);
00153 }
00154 
00155 int clGeometry::DeleteSurfaceID(const int ID)
00156 {
00157   int numberEntries = GetNumberSurfaces();
00158   int entryNumber   = GetSurfaceEntry(ID);
00159 
00160   if(entryNumber==-1)
00161   {
00162     throw clExceptionTree("clGeometry", "DeleteSurfaceID", "No surface with specified ID.");
00163   }
00164   else
00165   {
00166     numberEntries = surfaceList.DeleteItem(entryNumber);
00167   }
00168 
00169   return (numberEntries);
00170 }
00171 
00172 int clGeometry::DeleteSurfaceEntry(const int entryNumber)
00173 {
00174   // Delete the surface
00175   int numberEntries = surfaceList.DeleteItem(entryNumber);
00176 
00177   // Reset the initialisation-flag
00178   initialised = 0;
00179 
00180   return (numberEntries);
00181 }
00182 
00183 clSurface clGeometry::GetSurface(const int entryNumber) const
00184 {
00185   if(entryNumber<0 || entryNumber>=GetNumberSurfaces())
00186   {
00187     throw clExceptionTree("clGeometry", "GetSurface", "No surface with specified entry.");
00188   }
00189 
00190   return(surfaceList.GetItem(entryNumber));
00191 }
00192 
00193 clSurface* clGeometry::GetSurfacePointer(const int entryNumber) const
00194 {
00195   if(entryNumber<0 || entryNumber>=GetNumberSurfaces())
00196   {
00197     throw clExceptionTree("clGeometry", "GetSurface", "No surface with specified entry.");
00198   }
00199 
00200   return(surfaceList.GetItemPointer(entryNumber));
00201 }

00203 double clGeometry::GetMinX(void)
00204 {
00205   try
00206   {
00207     if(!initialised)
00208     {
00209       Initialise();
00210     }
00211   }
00212 
00213   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00214   {
00215     EX.AddMethodToTree("clGeometry::GetMinX");
00216     throw(EX);
00217   }
00218 
00219   return(xMin);
00220 }

00321 clGeometry& clGeometry::Assign(const clGeometry &source)
00322 {
00323   SetNumberID(source.GetNumberID());
00324 
00325   for(int i=0; i<source.GetNumberSurfaces(); i++)
00326   {
00327     AddSurface(source.GetSurface(i));
00328   }
00329 
00330   return(*this);
00331 }
00332 
00333 clGeometry& clGeometry::operator=(const clGeometry &source)
00334 {
00335   return(Assign(source));
00336 }
